    • About Hugo Balarezo and Sheri Drake


    Hugo Balarezo started selling real estate in 1985. He’s helped nearly 4,900 families buy or sell homes during his career. The key to his success has been a lot of hard work, persistence to stay ahead of the market, and an incredible staff that is dedicated to getting clients results. Our area of specialty is selling homes other agents have not been able to sell. We take a surgical approach to selling the home by asking the right questions, analyzing the answers, and developing a custom solution to get your home sold fast and for top dollar. Hugo is considered the Surgeon of Real Estate. He knows what to ask, what to look for, and how to fix it

    Sheri Drake, Broker/Owner of Elite Group Realty and Elite Property Manager, has worked in the Inland Empire Real Estate Market for over 30 years. Having grown up in the Riverside area, Sheri has seen the area change from a small home town to a growing suburban community. She has effectively worked every aspect of the industry representing sellers, buyers, investors and banks and starting a busy property management business. Through years of investing in her own properties and flipping houses she has developed a niche market by advising clients on what improvements will give them the best bang for their buck, helping them choose updated materials on a budget and helping them do light staging to help the home show well when selling or renting.
